channel.title: Problem with safe zones in pimpscape!
channel.description: i have a pimpscape source and i dont want it to be a pk server...so how can i remove all the pk zones exept wildy?? thanks

item.title: Problem with safe zones in pimpscape!
item.dc:creator: @happy2help happy2help
item.description:
@happy2help wrote:

-.-, you really and a pain…

find out the what the y co ordiante is just before you enter the wilderness then change the second 9999 to that co ordinate.

item.title: Problem with safe zones in pimpscape!
item.dc:creator: @happy2help happy2help
item.description:
@happy2help wrote:

wouldnt it be easier to get a non pk source? but oh well here it is:

go to your client.java and search for:

public boolean nonWild() {

you should see something similar to this:

if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435  && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431  && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250  && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419  && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3156  && absX <=3277 && absY >=3374  && absY <=3514 )||(absX >= 2704 && absX <= 2733 && absY >=9795  && absY <=9832 ) ||(absX >= 2362 && absX <= 2432 && absY >=5050  && absY <=5121 ) ||(absX >= 2972 && absX <= 2992 && absY >=9904  && absY <=9920 ) ||(absX >= 2532 && absX <= 2624 && absY >=3070  && absY <=3114 ) ||(absX >= 3397 && absX <= 3448 && absY >=9873  && absY <=9905 ) ||(absX >= 2435 && absX <= 2446 && absY >=3081  && absY <=3098 ) ||(absX >= 3338 && absX <= 3386 && absY >=9615  && absY <=9662 ) ||

replace all of that with:

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 0000 && absX <= 9999 && absY >= 0000 && absY <=9999 )

Read full topic
